en.title: [2025] Economic Statistics Review: Special Edition
en.description: Special edition of the Economic Statistics Review, focusing on 'Navigating Economic Landscapes'.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released a special edition of its economic statistics review ahead of the regular monthly release tomorrow. The special edition focuses on 'Navigating Economic Landscapes', and provides a comprehensive overview of Malaysia's economic evolution.

bm.title: [2025] Sorotan Statistik Ekonomi: Edisi Khas
bm.description: Edisi khas Sorotan Statistik Ekonomi, memberi tumpuan kepada 'Menelusuri Landskap Ekonomi'.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan edisi khas sorotan statistik ekonomi, sehari sebelum penerbitan bulanan berkala esok. Edisi khas ini memberi tumpuan kepada 'Menelusuri Landskap Ekonomi', dan memberikan gambaran menyeluruh tentang evolusi ekonomi Malaysia.
